summary: This document is a confidential email update regarding the suicide watch and psychological observation of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, sent on August 9, 2019, the day before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the suicide watch and psychological observation update at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: LCDR United States Public Health Service
persons.context: The forensic psychologist providing the observation update on Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

connections.person1: LCDR United States Public Health Service
connections.description: The forensic psychologist is conducting psychological observations of inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
events.description: A confidential update on the suicide watch and psychological observation status of Jeffrey Epstein is sent from the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
personsInvolved: LCDR United States Public Health Service

keyFacts: A confidential update on Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psychological observation was issued on August 9, 2019.
The update was provided by a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document is dated the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
